EmailTemplate.name: Platform Change notification - COM Users
EmailTemplate.subject: Previously approved EP {!FS_Installation__c.FS_Execution_Plan__c} for {!FS_Installation__c.Outlet_ACN__c}/{!FS_Installation__c.FS_Outlet_Name__c} had its platform type updated please resubmit for approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi, The dispenser platform has been updated for {!FS_Installation__c.Name} & {!FS_Installation__c.FS_Execution_Plan__c}, please take necessary action to resubmit EP for PM approval. Outlet Information : {!FS_Installation__c.FS_Outlet_Name__c} {!FS_Installation__c.FS_Outlet_Information__c} Thank You, FET
